item.title: Why Blog?
item.description:
What is the purpose of blogging? Who really gives a shit?

My purpose for this space is the following: 1. Social accountability Have you ever started a great project and let it die a slow, misreable death? I have and I’m tired of it. I believe writing about these things online can really help.
